text_logic_form: The area of the parallelogram is 100 square units.
Find the height of the parallelogram.
dissolved_text_logic_form: The area of the parallelogram $ABCD$ is 100 square units.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $AB$ is $x + 15$ units.
The length of the line $BE$ is $x$ units.
Point $E$ lies on the line connecting $D$ and $C$.
line_instances: There are lines $AB$, $AD$, $BC$, $BE$, $CE$, $DC$, and $DE$, forming the parallelogram $ABCD$ and its height.
